entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 02:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: WNW 46 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
